content:
Two Bulgarian teenagers were rescued from a circus in Italy after one of them was forced to swim in a tank full of piranhas for public amusement this week.  
Personally, I can't think of many things I'd rather see than a 19-year-old with the potential to be picked to the bone by fish, but the Italian police are obviously killjoys, and not nearly as much fun at parties as I am.
The girl emerged safely from her ordeal, but the younger of the two sisters, who was 16, was bitten when the circus placed her in a cage and threw snakes at her.  Three Italian men were arrested in the case, and have been charged with forcing the girls to live as virtual slaves-- paying them  100 euros each week and forcing them to live in an animal transport trailer.
title: Pirahnas Attack Sideshow Bob
author: whatsrequired
